mapper.select:
select
from sys_user where 1 = 1
AND username like concat(#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND name like concat(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND mobile like concat(#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
